Translations.Text: Ani waan isin gabbartan hin gabbaru
Isinis waan ani gabbaru kan gabbartan hin taane
Anis waan isin gabbartan (fuula duras) kan gabbaruu miti
Isinis waan ani gabbaru (fuula duras) kan gabbartanii miti
Isiniif amantiin keessan jira; anaafis amantiin kiyya jira
Namootas garee gareedhaan diinii Rabbii keessa kan seenan argite
Gooftaa kee faarsuu wajjin qulqulleessi; araaramas Isa irra barbaadInni akkaan tawbaa qeebalaadha
Qabeenyi isaatiifi wanti inni hores isa hin fayyanne
Ibidda abbaa bobayaa (belbelaa) taate seenuuf jira
Morma ishee keessa haada quncee temiraa irraa ta'etu jira
